from vpython import *

# Parameter Setup
size = 0.01     # size of the particle
m = 1E-11       # mass of the particle
v0 = 10         # initial speed of the particle
q = 1.6E-19     # charge of the particle
V = 1           # potential difference between the plates
d = 0.1         # distance between the plates
L = 0.5         # length of the plates
B = 1           # magnetic field strength
E_field = vec(0, -V/d, 0)  # electric field vector
B_field = vec(0, 0, -B)    # magnetic field vector
t = 0           # initial time
dt = 1E-5       # time step size

# Display Setup
scene = canvas(width=600, height=400, align='left', background=vec(0.5,0.5,0))
p1 = box(pos=vec(L/2, d/2, 0), size=vec(L, 0.01, 0.2), color=color.blue)
p2 = box(pos=vec(L/2, -d/2, 0), size=vec(L, 0.01, 0.2), color=color.blue)
charge = sphere(pos=vec(0, 0, 0), radius=size, color=color.red)
charge.v = vec(v0, 0, 0)
v_arrow = arrow(pos=charge.pos, axis=charge.v/6, color=color.green)
a_arrow = arrow(pos=charge.pos, axis=vec(0,0,0), color=color.yellow)
E_arrow = arrow(pos=vec(L/2, d/3, 0), axis=vec(0, -0.2, 0), color=color.orange)
B_arrow = arrow(pos=vec(L/2, -d/3, 0), axis=vec(0, 0, -0.2), color=color.cyan)

B_label = label(pos=B_arrow.pos, text='B', xoffset=20, yoffset=-25, space=30, height=16, color=color.cyan, font='sans')

# Object Motion
while charge.pos.x < L and abs(charge.pos.y) < d/2 - p1.height - size:
    rate(1000)
    if charge.pos.x < 0 or charge.pos.x > L:
        F = vec(0, 0, 0)
    else:
        F = q*(E_field + cross(charge.v, B_field))
    charge.v = charge.v + F/m*dt
    charge.pos = charge.pos + charge.v*dt
    v_arrow.pos = charge.pos
    v_arrow.axis = charge.v/6
    a_arrow.pos = charge.pos
    a_arrow.axis = F/m/6
    t = t + dt
